```{r include=FALSE}
# Process data
a=rep(0, 5000)
b=rep(1, 5000)
d=rep(2, 5000)
e=rep(3, 5000)
c <- c(a,b,d,e)
hbond_stride100_trajectory$TM4 <- c
levels(as.factor(hbond_stride100_trajectory$TM4))
```

```{r}
# Logistic regression (penalized)
alpha_list <- seq(from =0, to = 1, by =.0625)
#alpha_list <- seq(from =0, to = 1, by =.5)
EN <- function(Lambda) {
tuningGrid <- data.frame("alpha" = alpha_list, "lambda"= rep(Lambda, length(alpha_list)))
set.seed(100)
hbond_elnet = train(
  as.factor(TM4) ~ ., data = hbond_stride100_trajectory,
  method = "glmnet",
  lambda=Lambda,
  tuneGrid = tuningGrid,
  family = "multinomial",
  trControl = trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)
)
return(hbond_elnet)
}
```

```{r}
lambda_list=seq(from =0, to = 0.005, by =.00015625)
#lambda_list=seq(from =0, to = 0.005, by =0.0025)
EN_list=EN(lambda_list[1])$results$Accuracy
for (i in 2:length(lambda_list)){
  print(lambda_list[i])
  EN_list=data.frame(EN_list, EN(lambda_list[i])$results$Accuracy)
}
```

```{r}
# Row and column names
rownames(EN_list) <- alpha_list
colnames(EN_list) <- lambda_list
```

```{r}
# Save csv
write.csv(EN_list, "/deac/salsburyGrp/wud18/md/double_binding/hbond/elastic_net/WT_dK9_E8K_R4A.csv", row.names=TRUE)
```

```{r}
tuningGrid <- data.frame("alpha" = c(0.6875), "lambda"= c(0.00046875))
set.seed(100)
WT_dK9_E8K_R4A_final_model = train(
  as.factor(TM4) ~ ., data = hbond_stride100_trajectory,
  method = "glmnet",
  lambda=0.0003125,
  tuneGrid = tuningGrid,
  family = "multinomial",
  trControl = trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)
)
```

```{r}
# Parameters
Beta <- coef(WT_dK9_E8K_R4A_final_model$finalModel)
```

```{r}
Beta1=Beta$`0`[,1]
Beta2=Beta$`1`[,1]
Beta3=Beta$`2`[,1]
Beta4=Beta$`3`[,1]
```

```{r}
beta1 <- data.frame("WT" = c(Beta1[order(-Beta1), drop = FALSE][1:10], Beta1[order(-Beta1), drop = FALSE][514:523]))
beta2 <- data.frame("dK9" = c(Beta2[order(-Beta2), drop = FALSE][1:10], Beta2[order(-Beta2), drop = FALSE][514:523]))
beta3 <- data.frame("E8K" = c(Beta3[order(-Beta3), drop = FALSE][1:10], Beta3[order(-Beta3), drop = FALSE][514:523]))
beta4 <- data.frame("R4A" = c(Beta4[order(-Beta4), drop = FALSE][1:10], Beta4[order(-Beta4), drop = FALSE][514:523]))
```
